title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 270.3 - Extensions of time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 270.3 - Extensions of time

State Regulations

Tax Law, § 13 of § 1340(c); Codes and Ordinances of the

City of Yonkers, § 92-110

The provisions of Part 157 of this Title with respect to
extensions of time for New York State personal income tax purposes shall also
be applicable to extensions of time for City of Yonkers earnings tax
purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
270.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
